section1.title: Nou Haku = Rural and Fishing Village Stay Travel
section1.body: This is a type of travel where you stay at a farm or fishing house and experience the local lifestyle, culture, and nature.

section2.title: Preparing to Offer Nou Haku!
section2.body:
December is the off-season for asparagus. Currently, we are planning experiences for those interested in country living, nature activities,
and agriculture.
We are busy every day searching for local delicious ingredients and maintaining the garden.

section3.title: Wreath Making Experience with Natural Materials
section3.body:
On sunny days, we handcraft decorations using vines and parsnip gourds found in the garden and mountains.
Simply bundling them together creates a beautiful wreath.
How about trying a wreath making experience starting from gathering materials?
